basic.description:
Studies in Canadian fiction, poetry, and literary criticism in relation to recurring concerns within Canadian cultural history.
LEARNING HOURS    240 (72L;168P)
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: Literature and Culture in Canada

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite  (ENGL200 & ENGL290) and (a GPA of 2.4 on all ENGL units) and (registration in an ENGL Major or Medial Plan).
